entries.title: Apple previews a trio of apps that will finally replace iTunes for Windows
entries.description: The new apps are all roughly analogous to the versions that run on macOS.

entries.title: Biden taking “absolutely wrong approach” to crack down on Big Tech, critics say
entries.description: Biden asks Congress to stop Big Tech’s data-gulping, competition-smothering ways.

entries.title: Sedimentation threatens to steal capacity from nearly 50,000 dams
entries.description: Study shows the world’s dams could lose up to 28 percent of storage by 2050.

entries.title: Fortinet says hackers exploited critical vulnerability to infect VPN customers
entries.description: Remote code-execution bug was exploited to backdoor vulnerable servers.

entries.title: RIP HDMI Alt Mode, we hardly knew ye
entries.description: After failing to release any cables or adapters, HDMI Alt Mode is dead.

entries.title: Leaked Samsung Galaxy S23 pictures show off new camera design
entries.description: Samsung's new smartphones are launching February 1, and a lot has leaked.

entries.title: You’re not imagining it—new cars really have gotten much more expensive
entries.description: Kelly Blue Book data shows a 5% increase in average transaction prices since 2021.

entries.title: 2022 was once again one of the warmest years on record
entries.description: Final tallies contain no surprises—it was a warm one.

entries.title: Indigenous tech group asks Apache Foundation to change its name
entries.description: Identity as a "last tribe" is simplification and erasure, indigenous group says.

entries.title: EVs are getting too heavy and too powerful, safety chief says
entries.description: NTSB chief warns that heavier vehicles mean more severe injuries and deaths.

entries.title: FTC delays could send Microsoft and Activision back to the bargaining table
entries.description: August hearing blows past July deadline, triggering $3 billion "breakup fee."

entries.title: Warehouse workers say they “beat Amazon fair and square” in union fight
entries.description: Amazon plans to appeal labor board ruling certifying the company’s first union.

entries.title: Report claims Apple could reverse course and add touchscreens to Macs
entries.description: Apple execs have repeatedly, emphatically said that touch Macs are a bad idea.

entries.title: FAA outage that grounded flights blamed on old tech and damaged database file
entries.description: Notice to Air Missions outage puts spotlight on FAA's struggles with technology.

entries.title: Apple promises to disclose more details about app removals
entries.description: Addressing freedom-of-expression concerns about decision-making process.

entries.title: Here’s the story of a lunar image that doesn’t look remarkable, but really is
entries.description: What you're actually looking at is an area of the Moon that is in total darkness.

entries.title: Neutron imaging revealed the secrets of this gold-plated medieval pendant
entries.description: Pendant held 5 small silk and linen packets containing bones, likely religious relics.
